marklogic.body: Finally a Energy shot that actually works! Them other energy drinks gives me a Headache & makes my heart race. I said that I would never try another one again until I heard about street King. Once I read the Label and seen that it was All natural I had to try it. It has an amazing taste to it, not only that but I have energy throughout the whole day. Being that I'm a mom, I'm Always on the go, so this is perfect for me. I would absolutely recommend this to my family and friends. Also I hear that every time I purchase a Shot I'm feeding a child. Now That alone would be a reason to buy them, it doesn't get any better then that. Thanks Street King!!
